akn:section.akn:heading: Requirements relating to naming of Department property

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Except as expressly provided by law or as authorized under subsection (b), a facility, structure, or real property of the Department, and a major portion (such as a wing or floor) of any such facility, structure, or real property, may be named only for the geographic area in which the facility, structure, or real property is located.
